CssProperty.name: fit
CssProperty.description: Gives a hint for how to scale a replaced element if neither its 'width' nor its 'height' property is 'auto'.
CssProperty.syntax: Comma-separated list of 'fit' keywords where 'fit' = fill | hidden | meet | slice

entry.description: Scale the object's height and width independently so that the content just touches all edges of the containing box.
Do not scale the object.
Make the object as large as possible with its width <= 'width' and height <= 'height', while preserving its aspect ratio. Position the object as for the 'hidden' value.
Make the object as small as possible with its width >= 'width' and height >= 'height', while preserving its aspect ratio. Position the object as for the 'hidden' value.

CssProperty.name: fit-position
CssProperty.description: Gives a hint for how to scale a replaced element if neither its 'width' nor its 'height' property is 'auto'.

entry.description: Scale the object's height and width independently so that the content just touches all edges of the containing box.
Do not scale the object.
Make the object as large as possible with its width <= 'width' and height <= 'height', while preserving its aspect ratio. Position the object as for the 'hidden' value.
Make the object as small as possible with its width >= 'width' and height >= 'height', while preserving its aspect ratio. Position the object as for the 'hidden' value.

CssProperty.name: page
CssProperty.description: Specifies a particular type of page where an element SHOULD be displayed

entry.description: ISO A5 media: 148mm wide and 210 mm high
IS0 A4 media: 210 mm wide and 297 mm high
ISO A3 media: 297mm wide and 420mm high
ISO B5 media: 176mm wide by 250mm high
ISO B4 media: 250mm wide by 353mm high
North American letter media: 8.5 inches wide and 11 inches high
North American legal: 8.5 inches wide by 14 inches high
North American ledger: 11 inches wide by 17 inches high

CssProperty.name: page-break-before
CssProperty.description: Defines rules for page breaks before an element.

entry.description: Always force a page break before the generated box.
Neither force nor forbid a page break before the generated box.
Avoid a page break before the generated box.
Force one or two page breaks before the generated box so that the next page is formatted as a left page.
Force one or two page breaks before the generated box so that the next page is formatted as a right page.

CssProperty.name: page-break-after
CssProperty.description: Defines rules for page breaks after an element.

entry.description: Always force a page break after the generated box.
Neither force nor forbid a page break after generated box.
Avoid a page break after the generated box.
Force one or two page breaks after the generated box so that the next page is formatted as a left page.
Force one or two page breaks after the generated box so that the next page is formatted as a right page.

CssProperty.name: page-break-inside
CssProperty.description: Defines rules for page breaks inside an element.

entry.description: Neither force nor forbid a page break inside the generated box.
Avoid a page break inside the generated box.

CssProperty.name: orphans
CssProperty.description: Specifies the minimum number of lines in a block element that must be left at the bottom of a page.

CssProperty.name: widows
CssProperty.description: Specifies the minimum number of lines in a block element that must be left at the top of a page.

CssPseudo.name: :right
CssPseudo.description: When printing double-sided documents, the page boxes on left and right pages may be different. This can be expressed through CSS pseudo-classes defined in the page context.

CssPseudo.name: :left
CssPseudo.description: When printing double-sided documents, the page boxes on left and right pages may be different. This can be expressed through CSS pseudo-classes defined in the page context.

CssPseudo.name: :first
CssPseudo.description: When printing double-sided documents, the page boxes on left and right pages may be different. This can be expressed through CSS pseudo-classes defined in the page context.

entry.description: The page box will be set to the size and orientation of the page sheet chosen by the UA.
Specifies that the page's content be printed in landscape orientation.
Specifies that the page's content be printed in portrait orientation.

CssProperty.name: marks
CssProperty.description: Provides paged media with crop marks to allow printouts to be cropped and aligned.

entry.description: Crop marks will be printed on the page.
Registration marks will be printed on the page.
No crop or registration marks will be printed on the page.

CssAtDirective.name: top-left
CssAtDirective.description: A variable-width box within the area defined by the top margin and adjoining the top-left-corner margin box.

CssAtDirective.name: top-left-corner
CssAtDirective.description: A fixed-size box filling the area defined by the intersection of the top and left margins of the page box.

CssAtDirective.name: top-center
CssAtDirective.description: A variable-width box within the area defined by the top margin, centered on the page area, and between the top-left and top-right margin boxes.

CssAtDirective.name: top-right
CssAtDirective.description: A variable-width box within the area defined by the top margin and adjoining the top-right-corner margin box.

CssAtDirective.name: top-right-corner
CssAtDirective.description: A box filling the area defined by the intersection of the top and right margins of the page box.

CssAtDirective.name: left-top
CssAtDirective.description: A variable-height box within the area defined by the left margin and adjacent to the bottom of the top-left-corner.

CssAtDirective.name: left-middle
CssAtDirective.description: A variable-height box in the area defined by the left margin, centered on the page area, and between the left-top and left-bottom margin boxes.

CssAtDirective.name: left-bottom
CssAtDirective.description: A variable-height box within the area defined by the left margin and adjacent to the top of the bottom-left-corner.

CssAtDirective.name: right-top
CssAtDirective.description: A variable-height box within the area defined by the right margin and adjacent to the bottom of the top-right-corner.

CssAtDirective.name: right-middle
CssAtDirective.description: A variable-height box in the area defined by the right margin, centered on the page area, and between the right-top and right-bottom margin boxes.

CssAtDirective.name: right-bottom
CssAtDirective.description: A variable-height box within the area defined by the right margin and adjacent to the top of the bottom-right-corner.

CssAtDirective.name: bottom-left-corner
CssAtDirective.description: A box filling the area defined by the intersection of the bottom and left margins of the page box.

CssAtDirective.name: bottom-left
CssAtDirective.description: A variable-width box within the area defined by the bottom margin and adjoining the bottom-left-corner margin box.

CssAtDirective.name: bottom-center
CssAtDirective.description: A variable-width box within the area defined by the bottom margin, centered on the page area, and between the bottom-left and bottom-right margin boxes.

CssAtDirective.name: bottom-right
CssAtDirective.description: A variable-width box within the area defined by the bottom margin and adjoining the bottom-right corner margin box.

CssAtDirective.name: bottom-right-corner
CssAtDirective.description: A box filling the area defined by the intersection of the bottom and right margins of the page box.
